ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Monster's Hi-Octane Horror; Leo's Ghost; The Man Who Never Smiled; The Metamorphosis of the Gkmloooms; Mr. Monster's 3-D Hi-Octane Horror [conclusion]
ComicInfo.Summary: A rich man who never smiles gets attacked in his cave by a greedy man who nobody will ever miss...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:37:17. [CVDB357548] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:10:59. [Issue ID 41715]
